Interface CountriesRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Countries,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Countries,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Countries,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Countries,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Countries,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Countries>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Countries,Integer>
@Repository public interface CountriesRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Countries,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Countries,Integer>

    • findCountriesByMoviesId

    • findByCountry

      List<Countries> findByCountry(String country)

    • findUniqueCountries

      @Query("SELECT DISTINCT c.country FROM Countries c") List<String> findUniqueCountries()

    • countCountriesByName

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(c) FROM Countries c WHERE c.country = :country") long countCountriesByName(@Param("country") String country)

    • findTopCountries

      @Query("SELECT c.country FROM Countries c ORDER BY c.country ASC") List<Countries> findTopCountries(Pageable pageable)

    • countAllUniqueCountries

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.country) FROM Countries c") long countAllUniqueCountries()

    • findTop10Countries

      @Query("SELECT c FROM Countries c ORDER BY c.country DESC") List<Countries> findTop10Countries(Pageable pageable)

    • findTop10MostPopularCountries

      @Query(value="SELECT c.country, COUNT(cm.country_id) AS movie_count FROM countries_movies cm JOIN countries c ON cm.country_id = c.id GROUP BY c.id, c.country ORDER BY movie_count DESC LIMIT 10", nativeQuery=true) List<Map<String,Object>> findTop10MostPopularCountries()
